title: Schedule New Hire Orientation
description: An onboarding specialist needs to schedule a new hire for the bi-weekly new hire orientation session.

tasks.description: Identify all new hires starting in the next two weeks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist generates a list of upcoming new hires from the HRIS.

tasks.description: Enroll the new hires in the next available orientation session in the LMS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully enrolls all new hires.

tasks.description: Send a calendar invitation and welcome packet to the new hires with the details of the orientation.
